experience.title: Summer Intern
experience.description: My role as a technical undergraduate in Cisco Systems, a world leader in computer networking products was to build a robust tool called "XR Resource Meter" for monitoring remote routers in a computer network. The tool is used to fetch dynamic multi-dimensional scale and resource data, compare this data with that of any other router's data in the network.I was awarded with a Pre Placement Offer in the role of Software Developer. One of the few internship projects that actually got deployed in the company, and is adding value for Cisconians.
experience.description_html: My role as a technical undergraduate in Cisco Systems, a world leader in computer networking products was to build a robust tool called "XR Resource Meter" for monitoring remote routers in a computer network. The tool is used to fetch dynamic multi-dimensional scale and resource data, compare this data with that of any other router's data in the network.I was awarded with a Pre Placement Offer in the role of Software Developer. One of the few internship projects that actually got deployed in the company, and is adding value for Cisconians.

experience.title: Summer Intern
experience.description: My role in Crompton Greaves Consumer Electricals Limited was to identify and curate technical competency requirements through discussions with various stakeholders of the company. I also analysed the Performance Management System database and recommended courses that benefitted 1200 employees.

projects: [{"title":"National Artificial Intelligence Resource Portal (NAIRP)","start_date":"Dec 2020","end_date":"Feb 2021","description":"• Got an opportunity to contribute in the development of NAIRP platform, India’s own AI Resource platform, powered by Amazon SageMaker, a collaboration of IIT Kharagpur with Amazon Web Services to promote learning and development in AI and Machine Learning• Prototyped concepts in Machine Learning into hands-on running modules contributing to open-source educational resources and workbook development"},{"title":"Pediatric Medical Data Acquisition Platform","start_date":"Dec 2019","end_date":"Apr 2020","description":"• Created a end-to-end platform covering everything from client interface to data storage to help obtain medical records for A.I.I.M.S. Bhubaneswar. Also provided the functionality to print these records by saving the data into PDF format."}]

honors_and_awards.title: 'How to Open IIT KGP' Case Study
honors_and_awards.description: • Winner of the 'How to Open IIT KGP' Case Study Challenge. • Worked with a team of 10+ members to formulate a detailed plan for minimising the impact of the COVID'19 pandemic in the process of reopening of IIT Kharagpur campus • Ideated proper functioning of mess, tech market, and small businesses of every hall in the campus with minimal risks
